description: Restaurants and cafes can also reopen from Monday provided they can observe social distancing.
title: Coronavirus lockdown: Pubs, restaurants and barbers reopen in Ireland
title_page: Coronavirus lockdown: Pubs, restaurants and barbers reopen in Ireland - BBC News
maintext: "There is a demand out there for the reopening and it will now be up to each individual pub to make sure they provide an environment that maintains public confidence and allows them to continue to trade."
